examples: The treaty carries the force of law.

the conclusion of the peace treaty

The treaty will come into force on the stroke of midnight tonight.

The terms of the treaty were generous.
The two countries are drafting a treaty.

Finally, the two sides compromised and a treaty was signed.

an initiatory step toward a treaty
They refused to recognize the treaty.
The treaty forbids the country to rearm.
The treaty neutralized the small republic.
They discussed the working draft of a peace treaty.
